name: NAKA Pay
author: NAKA GLOBAL Ltd.

sections.description:
The NAKA Pay extension gives your online store a real-time competitive advantage, introducing a new and trending payment method to your customers. By enabling crypto payments you gain access to over 40 million new customers from all over the world.

You will be able to accept payments in over 50 different cryptocurrencies and swap between instant crypto settlements or zero volatility risk settlements in your local currency.

The crypto payment network is secure and complies with all relevant ISO standards and mandatory regulations.

NAKA Pay will make your online store stand out from the competition. Be among the first to accept crypto payments today.

Web Payments API Support

NAKA Pay includes Web Payments API support, which means customers can pay using payment details associated to their mobile devices, in browsers supporting the Web Payments API (Chrome for Android, amongst others).
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you donâ€™t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic installation of the NAKA Pay plugin follow these steps:
1. Log in to WordPress admin.
2. Go to Plugins > Add New.
3. Search for the NAKA Pay plugin.
4. Click on Install Now, wait until the plugin is installed successfully and click on Activate.

Setup

To set up the NAKA Pay you need to have a NAKA account. If you do not have an account yet sign up > here. Follow the steps below to connect the plugin to your NAKA account:
1. After you have activated the NAKA Pay plugin, go to WooCommerce > Settings.
2. Click the Payments tab.
3. Enter the Host, OTP and Terminal ID that you received on your email address.
4. Click Save changes.
